Description:
Model
Brand: ASUS
Model: Z790-AYW WIFI W
Part Number: 90MB1HT0-M0AAY0


Supported CPU
CPU Socket Type: LGA 1700
CPU Type: Intel Core 13th Gen (LGA 1700) / Intel Core 14th Gen (LGA 1700)


Chipsets
Chipset: Intel Z790


Memory
Number of Memory Slots: 4x288pin (DDR5)
Memory Standard: DDR5 5600
Maximum Memory Supported: 192GB
Memory Performance Profile: Intel XMP 3.0
Memory Feature: DDR5 8000+(OC)/7800(OC)/7600(OC)/7400(OC)/7200(OC)/7000(OC)/6800(OC)/6600(OC)/6400(OC)/6200(OC)/6000(OC)/5800(OC)/5600/5400/5200/5000/4800 Non-ECC, Un-buffered Memory*


Expansion Slots
PCI Express 4.0 x16: Intel Core Processors (14th & 13th & 12th Gen):
1 x PCIe 4.0 x16 slot

Intel Z790 Chipset:
2 x PCIe 4.0 x16 slots (support x4 mode)
PCI Express x1: 2 x PCIe 4.0 x1 slots


Storage Devices
SATA 6Gb/s: 4 x SATA 6Gb/s
M.2: Intel Core Processors (14th & 13th & 12th Gen):
M.2_1 slot (Key M), type 2242/2260/2280/22110 (supports PCIe 4.0 x4 mode)

Intel Z790 Chipset:
M.2_2 slot (Key M), type 2242/2260/2280 (supports PCIe 4.0 x4 mode)
M.2_3 slot (Key M), type 2242/2260/2280/22110 (supports PCIe 4.0 x4 & SATA modes)
SATA RAID: Intel Rapid Storage Technology supports SATA RAID 0/1/5/10
Additional RAID Controller: Intel Rapid Storage Technology supports PCIe RAID 0/1/5/10


Onboard Audio
Audio Channels: Realtek 7.1 Surround Sound High Definition Audio CODEC*
- Supports: Jack-detection, Multi-streaming, Front Panel Jack-retasking
- Supports up to 24-Bit/192 kHz playback
Audio Features 
- Audio Shielding
- Premium audio capacitors
- Dedicated audio PCB layers
* A chassis with an HD audio module in the front panel is required to support 7.1 Surround Sound audio output.


Onboard LAN
LAN Chipset: 1 x Realtek 2.5Gb Ethernet
ASUS LANGuard
Max LAN Speed: 2.5Gbps
Wireless LAN: Wi-Fi 802.11 ax
Bluetooth: Bluetooth 5.3


Rear Panel Ports
Back I/O Ports: 2 x USB 10Gbps ports (1 x Type-A+1 x Type-C)
2 x USB 5Gbps ports (2 x Type-A)
4 x USB 2.0 ports (4 x Type-A) 
1 x HDMI port
1 x Wi-Fi Module
1 x Realtek 2.5Gb Ethernet port
3 x Audio jacks
1 x BIOS FlashBack button


Internal I/O Connectors
Onboard USB: 1 x USB 10Gbps connector (supports USB Type-C) 
2 x USB 5Gbps headers support 4 additional USB 5Gbps ports
2 x USB 2.0 headers support 4 additional USB 2.0 ports
Other Connectors: Fan and Cooling related 
1 x 4-pin CPU Fan header
1 x 4-pin CPU OPT Fan header
1 x 4-pin AIO Pump header
3 x 4-pin Chassis Fan headers

Miscellaneous
3 x Addressable Gen 2 headers
1 x Clear CMOS header
1 x COM Port header
1 x Front Panel Audio header (F_AUDIO) 
1 x S/PDIF Out header
1 x SPI TPM header (14-1pin)
1 x 20-5pin System Panel header
1 x Thunderbolt (USB4) Header


Physical Spec
Form Factor: ATX
Dimensions (W x L): 12.0" x 9.6"
Power Pin: 1 x 24-pin Main Power connector
1 x 8-pin +12V Power connector
1 x 4-pin +12V Power connector


Windows Compatibility
Windows 11: Supported


Features
Features: ASUS 5X PROTECTION III
- DIGI+ VRM (- Digital power design with DrMOS)
- LANGuard 
- Overvoltage Protection
- SafeSlot Core+
- Stainless-Steel Back I/O
ASUS Q-Design 
- M.2 Q-Latch
- Q-DIMM
- Q-Slot
- Q-LED Core
ASUS Thermal Solution
- M.2 heatsinks 
- VRM heatsinks design
ASUS EZ DIY
- BIOS FlashBack button
- ProCool
- Pre-mounted I/O shield
Aura Sync
- Addressable Gen 2 headers

Armoury Crate

AI Suite 3
